name: Segway Sunset and Boardwalk Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Segway Tour ===
top of page Tour Includes Your own Segway for the duration of the tour. Free courtesy b us pickup and return. Delicious light dinner meal. Informative commentary throughout the tour by our experienced tour guide. Safety helmet and full Segway rider training. Rest stops to take in the sights and sounds of the area. Fun and smiles all round! Light Dinner: A choice of a delicious Pizza, Pasta or dessert. What to bring: Hat, camera, jacket or raincoat in cold/inclement weather. Cash for drinks or additional food. Ages: 12 and over. Weight: Between 45kg and 117kg and ability to stand unaided . Pick up Approx 3pm Return approx 6pm (1st April  ->  31st October) Pick up Approx 4 pm Return approx 7pm (1st November  ->  March 31st) Pick up time and location will be confirmed at time of booking. Private, corporate or group bookings available. Whitsunday Segway Tours operates in most weather conditions subject to safety requirements. SEGWAY RAINFOREST DISCOVERY TOUR SEGWAY SUNSET AND BOARDWALK TOUR (includes dinner) bottom of page

name: Segway Rainforest Discovery Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Segway Tour 2 ===
top of page Tour Includes Your own Segway for the duration of the tour. Free courtesy bus pickup and return. Freshly made morning tea pack with tea and coffee. Informative commentary throughout the tour from our experienced tour guide. Safety helmet and full Segway rider training. Rest stops to take in the sights and sounds of the area. Fun and smiles all round! Pick up approx 9:15am Return approx 12:30pm - 1pm Pick up time and location will be confirmed at time of booking What to bring: Hat, camera, jacket or raincoat in cold/inclement weather. Covered shoes are recommended. Ages: 12 and over. Weight: Between 45kg and 117kg and ability to stand unaided. Morning tea includes: Blueberry muffin, chocolate brownie, mixed dried fruit and nuts, apple, bottle of water, tea and coffee. Private, corporate or group bookings available. Whitsunday Segway Tours operates in most weather conditions subject to safety requirements. SEGWAY RAINFOREST DISCOVERY TOUR SEGWAY SUNSET AND BOARDWALK TOUR (includes dinner) bottom of page
